title: Practical Public Health Project Design: Solving Community Health Issues

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of public health fundamentals, general awareness of community health issues
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment where current practitioners solve real community health issues, enabling collaboration and research using personal devices.

learning_goals: Analyze community health case studies and propose three public health strategies
Design collaborative approaches with community stakeholders and produce project proposals
Develop and present preventive education materials for families of dementia patients
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
